summary:
• Over 9 years of hands-on experience in MDM/ERP functional design, implementation, development, integration, upgrade, and user support.
• Expertise in the domain of Master Data Management and Contract Management.
• Implementation experience on Customer Data Quality measures like :
1 Dun and Bradstreet Integration
2 Trillium Integration
3 Customer Deduplication
• Migration and syndication to different third party systems.
• Extensive experience in developing interface/conversion programs to import data from various sources into Oracle Applications
• Worked in Agile Methodology and have exposure to tools like Jira and Rally
• Broad cross-module knowledge in Oracle Financials, Oracle Supply Chain Management and Contract 
Management
• Experience in project management, including on-going communication with end users, requirement gathering, business processes mappings, functional gap analysis, solution design and test script generation.
• Defect analysis and coordination with cross teams and stakeholders; Assisting Business with the testing.

Core Skillsets:
1. Oracle ERP Application
2. SQL and PL/SQL
3.Microsoft Power BI
4. Advanced Microsoft Excel and Power Point
5. Tortoise SVN
6. Git
7. Confluence
8. Kibana
9. HP ALM

profile_positions.description:
Description:
As a data analyst worked on a multi-company Business Engine Transformation project to migrate five operating companies (part of a fortune 500 company) with three different ERPs to a single ERP.

Accountabilities:
•	Migrated Master Data and its related entities like relationships, addresses and user defined attributes from legacy ERP to to-be ERP for a global leading building material manufacturer.
•	Leaded the mapping and data migration activities
     o	Map product hierarchy b/w legacy and to-be ERP
     o	Define data relevancy rules
     o	Identify and resolve potential data issues
•	Reviewed and confirm data validations are completed to agreed standards
•	Identify new requirements and opportunities and include those into implementation discussions for immediate or future phases
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
DESCRIPTION:
As an ERP business analyst the primary responsibility is to make sure that any production incidents are resolved with the stipulated SLA and there is no loss of business. Prepare customer reconciliations, help identify priorities and facilitate payment clearing against invoices. As team lead, I managed a team including onshore and offshore and was responsible for both client and project level communications. 

Accountabilities:
• Collaborated with multiple business units to author functional/technical specifications and process flows to ensure project work was aligned with business requirement.
• Creating and maintaining performance dashboards and regular follow up on relevant Supply Chain KPI’s
• Serve as subject matter expert (SME) of MDM business process cycles, Contract Management, and system integration.
• Conducted gap analysis, document functional requirements and use cases, write functional design (MD50) for PDH extensions, and assist technical design and development.
• Intermediate to advanced SQL query writing to mine, join and interrogate business data
• Ensured security of system and integrity of master documents by implementing document and system access rights and revision controls.
• Involved in all phases of the SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) from analysis, design, development, testing, implementation, and maintenance with timely delivery against aggressive deadlines.
• Tracked and ensured there is no breach in Incident’s SLA or business loss.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Resources Planning Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
DESCRIPTION:
The primary responsibility is to translate and fit business requirements into Oracle MDM applications (Customer Data Hub and Product Data Hub). Canon Unity change program focuses on applying new Business processes and supporting IT applications across Canon Europe. Being part of Canon Unity program the key accountability is to ensure that customer and product master data is recognized and persisted across Canon IT landscape in both intermediate and end state.


Accountabilities:
• Mapping business needs to Business requirements and IT Requirements.
• Define and develop solution designs (Extensions and Customizations), use cases and system processes
• Conducting proof of concept, system demo and new functionality walkthrough with end business.
• Define Interfaces with Siebel, SFDC, Oracle E-Business Suite, Dun and Bradstreet, Legacy applications.
• Delivering Customer data remodeling at Canon CDH (involved changes to 20+ packages covering existing business critical transactional interfaces and customizations).
• Ensure quality of delivered solutions by reviewing test plans and test results.
• Providing user training and post production support.
• Design Customer Migration approach from legacy application. Review delivered migration code and migration results.
profile_positions.title: Master Data Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
DESCRIPTION:
Developed integrations between Oracle CDH and spoke systems. Implemented customizations in Oracle PIM to ensure data quality with-in system. The application was used as the central repository for all the Items and Customer within whole landscape.

Accountabilities:
• Understanding the Canon landscape and technologies used.
• 24*7 support for major new product and offer releases.
• Understanding and resolving incidents.
• Keeping a track of SLAs and business loss, if any.
• Creating and maintaining a Knowledge Database of known issues.
• Managing the team activities like Timesheet entry, billing cycles and activities etc.
• Onsite offshore co-ordination and synergy maintenance.
• Work on and deliver any minor changes/new developments required within the application.
profile_positions.title: Oracle Developer-MDM

profile_positions.description:
DESCRIPTION:
As a developer for a leading global healthcare, the primary responsibility is the gather requirements and implement those. Integrated MDM-PIM with upstream and downstream systems. The application was primarily used for maintaining medical devices.

Accountabilities:
• Gather business requirements and analyze the impact on applications.
• Create Solution Designs pertaining to the requirements.
• Support full SIT and UAT.
profile_positions.title: Oracle Developer-Product Data Hub (PDH)
